Eucerin Advanced Cleansing Body & Face Cleanser

Brand: Eucerin

Category: Body Wash/Cleanser

Ingredients: WATER, SODIUM COCOAMPHOACETATE, SODIUM MYRETH SULFATE, LAURYL GLUCOSIDE, CITRIC ACID, SODIUM CHLORIDE, METHYLPROPANEDIOL, PANTHENOL, GLYCERIN, PEG-40 HYDROGENATED CASTOR OIL, COCO-GLUCOSIDE, GLYCOL DISTEARATE, PEG-200 HYDROGENATED GLYCERYL PALMATE, SODIUM CITRATE, POLYQUATERNIUM-10, SODIUM ACETATE, SODIUM BENZOATE
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
